00004 
00005 #ifdef DEBUG
00006 #include <iostream>
00007 #define debug(x) std::cerr << x << std::endl;
00008 #define debugnnl(x) std::cerr << x;
00009 #define debugl0(x, y) if (y > 0) { std::cerr << x << ": " << y << std::endl; }
00010 #define INDENT ("  ")
00011 #else
00012 #define debug(x)

00014 #define debugl0(x, y)
